title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and subject matter experts in interrogation processes.

title: System Architecture Design for AIInterrogationAssistant
description: Design the overall system architecture focusing on modularity, maintainability, scalability, and security. The design will encompass components for speech analysis, micro-expression detection, physiological data processing, and integration with existing interrogation systems. It will prioritize compliance with relevant laws, regulations, ethical guidelines regarding privacy, consent, data protection, and the responsible use of AI in law enforcement. This task depends on Project Planning and Requirements Gathering, Legal and Ethical Review, Data Privacy and Security Assessment. The design should aim for a flexible and extensible architecture to accommodate future enhancements and modifications. This RFC is currently in DRAFT state and awaits review and feedback from the team.

title: Data Collection and Preprocessing
description: Identify and acquire relevant datasets for training the AI models, including speech recordings, video footage, and physiological data. Preprocess the data for model training.

title: AI Model Development
description: Develop and train AI models for speech analysis, micro-expression detection, and physiological data processing using appropriate machine learning techniques.

title: User Interface Design - AI Interrogation Assistant (Revised)
description: Design an intuitive, user-friendly, and ethically sound interface for the AI interrogation assistant. The revised design prioritizes usability, accessibility, and data privacy while seamlessly integrating with existing interrogation systems. Collaboration is essential with law enforcement agencies, legal experts, human rights organizations, and UI/UX experts. Incorporate features such as data visualization, real-time monitoring, and customizable settings based on user roles and permissions. Ensure the design adheres to ethical guidelines, relevant regulations, and best practices for interface design, with a special focus on usability and accessibility considerations for users with disabilities. Key updates include an emphasis on transparency, providing clear indicators of AI decision-making processes, and ensuring user control over data usage. Revise the description to reflect these changes. Update the task status to 'IN_PROGRESS' once work has commenced, and update the rfc_state field to 'APPROVED' if the revised description is accepted. Assign this task to a UI/UX expert or frontend-developer.
dependencies: Ethical Guidelines and Legal Compliance Review
UI/UX Design Principles and Best Practices

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend components, including the AI models, data processing pipelines, and integration with existing interrogation systems.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the user interface for the AI interrogation assistant, following the design specifications and integrating with the backend components.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Assess and address security and privacy concerns related to the handling of sensitive data, such as speech recordings and physiological data.

title: Testing and Evaluation
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy and conduct thorough testing of the AI interrogation assistant, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and Maintenance
description: Plan and execute the deployment of the AI interrogation assistant, including infrastructure setup, monitoring, and ongoing maintenance.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the AI interrogation assistant, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for interrogators.
